name: default_alt_text
description: Default alt text generation prompt for accessibility
system_prompt: You are an accessibility expert who writes alt text for images. Your alt text should be concise, descriptive, and meaningful.
prompt_template:
Generate a concise, accessible alt text for this image.

Requirements:
- Maximum {{max_length}} characters
- Do NOT start with 'image of', 'picture of', 'photo of', or similar phrases
- Focus on the purpose and meaning, not just visual description
- Be specific and informative
- Write in present tense
- Consider the context: {{context}}
- Image purpose: {{purpose}}

Respond with ONLY the alt text, nothing else. No quotes, no explanations.
guidelines: Include relevant text visible in the image
For complex images, summarize the key takeaway
validation_rules: Must not start with: image of, picture of, photo of, graphic of
Must not contain: click here, link to
